about_the_game:
The Class of '09 series transforms the visual novel medium into a fully voiced American-style sitcom that anyone can pick up and enjoy! You can choose the adventure of mean teenage girls featuring biting social accuracy as they navigate life from 2007 to 2009.

The stories and characters are all inspired by real events, encounters, and personalities experienced by the writer/lead developer.


Class of '09 and Nicole made huge waves on Twitch and TikTok in 2023... and now the franchise is back with Jecka in control of the Class of '09 story! Nicole's blonde best friend comes with her own set of traumatic problems you'll need to navigate her through. There are 5 more endings with another secret bonus video for you to watch to discover the true meaning of this wild series.


The Class of '09 series has not abandoned its easy pickup-and-play storytelling model. Class of '09: The Flip Side is another rich collection of sitcom style story stems any player can enjoy with minimal context. However this time... some plotlines might change how you saw the Class of '09 story before!
Class of '09: The Flip Side, nor any fan of the series, will take this new perspective for granted.


Kayli Mills returns as the voice of Jecka now leading the game! Elsie Lovelock after winning a One Voice Award for her performance as Nicole, reprises her role as well. We are not exaggerating when we say Class of '09 features the greatest voicework in the history of gaming. From dramatic moments to landing difficult punchlines, the award-winning Class of '09 cast never misses a beat in this fully voiced saga.

All characters depicted are age 18+

content_descriptors.notes: Player discretion is advised. Class of '09: The Flip Side features but does not endorse criminal activity, drug use, driving under the influence, strong language, suicide, bullying, and self-harm.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)

name: Class of '09: The Flip Side

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Class of '09: The Flip Side

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: The final chapter of the Class of '09 VN series... this time from a different perspective! Join Nicole's best friend Jecka as you help her navigate the pitfalls of post-grad life! See what 2009 was truly like in this fully voiced interactive sitcom!
